name: jmw-superclaude-marketplace
description: JMW's customized SuperClaude skills and development patterns

plugins.name: jmw-superclaude
plugins.description: 16 SuperClaude skills for confidence-driven development: 7 core skills (sc-agent, confidence-check, deep-research, self-review, repo-index, index-repo, session-summary), 6 domain skills (sc-architecture, sc-security, sc-workflows, sc-performance, sc-quality, sc-executor), 2 planning skills (create-prd, generate-tasks with Opus 4), and skill-selector helper.
